Work.title: Featured Case Studies
Work.description: A selection of professional projects where I led the frontend execution, focused on delivering measurable impact through engineering and architectural clarity.

p1.title: Enterprise Ticketing & Booking Engine
p1.challenge: Built a high-stakes booking platform from the ground up, requiring real-time availability sync and secure payment orchestration.
p1.solution: Architected the frontend using React/Next.js and TailwindCSS. Engineered a robust state management system to handle real-time concurrency and integrated Firebase for live data updates.
p1.result: Launched a production-ready system capable of handling thousands of concurrent bookings with seamless stability.

p2.title: Unified Admin & Customer Platform
p2.challenge: Developed a synchronized platform ecosystem requiring a complex administrative dashboard and a high-traffic customer-facing site.
p2.solution: Leveraged Nuxt.js and SCSS to build a modular component library. Designed a unified data layer to ensure consistent state across the administration and user-facing environments.
p2.result: Delivered a scalable foundation that allowed the product team to ship new features [X]% faster without increasing technical debt.

p3.title: B2B E-Commerce Solution
p3.challenge: Engineered a B2B commerce platform focused on data-heavy product catalogs and complex enterprise procurement workflows.
p3.solution: Optimized frontend performance using Nuxt.js and Nuxt Image. Streamlined the procurement journey through intuitive UX patterns and efficient API data fetching strategies.
p3.result: Successfully deployed a stable, business-centric platform that improved data clarity for corporate users.

p4.title: Igetweb – Automated Theme Engine
p4.challenge: Developed a scalable theme customization layer for a leading website builder platform to support rapid design iterations.
p4.solution: Engineered a flexible theme engine using PHP and modular CSS/JS patterns, allowing for decoupled UI updates from the core platform logic.
p4.result: Reduced theme deployment time by [X]% and enabled the design team to iterate autonomously without core system risks.
